name: Clara Rodriguez-Nuñez
bio:
Clara Rodríguez-Núñez is currently working
toward the PhD degree in computer science with
the Complutense University of Madrid under the
supervision of prof. Elvira Albert and prof. Albert
Rubio. She is working on verification and optimization
of ZK circuits and static analysis of smart-
contracts, including techniques for ensuring 
modularity in the presence of callbacks. She is one
of the main developers of the CIRCOM compiler.
